text:
ISBN-13: 9781572244252.
ISBN-10: 1572244259.
Title: Get Out of Your Mind & Into Your Life.
Subtitle: The New Acceptance & Commitment Therapy.
Authors: Steven C. Hayes;Spencer Xavier Smith.
Categories: Self-Help.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=myvCAQAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Features step-by step mindfulness and acceptance exercises for effective relief from emotional pain. This book develops acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT), a revolutionary direction in psychotherapy, into step-by-step exercises that readers can use to get relief from emotional pain..
